Name: Hammer Heads Deluxe
About the game: Pesky yard gnomes are invading your lawn! The only way to stop them is with a swift hammer blow to the head. Bash gnomes as quickly as you can while keeping an eye out for special gnomes, prizes and power-ups! Earn gold coins and shop the shiny store for upgrades.
